Key Match Events: The Tigers scored two runs in the bottom of the 6th inning and two more in the bottom of the 8th inning to secure a 4-3 win over the Rays
Post-Match Reflections: The Tigers' magic number is now one, meaning they just need to win one more game, or have the Minnesota Twins lose one more, to reach the postseason
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers swept the series vs the Rays
